title: Brazilian Environment Minister Ricardo Salles Steps Down Amid Illegal Logging Probe
sub_head: Move comes weeks after he was targeted by federal police in an investigation into alleged illegal logging in the Amazon rainforest
body:
SÃO PAULO—Brazilian Environment Minister Ricardo Salles stepped down, the official government gazette said Wednesday, weeks after he was targeted by federal police in an investigation into alleged illegal logging in the Amazon rainforest.
More to come.
